item.title: Building confidence with arbitrary prompt changes: Datasets
item.description: At Aldara, we solve HOAs (homeowners’ associations’) management at scale. One of our core services is customer support and task management for our clients, ranging from short-lived customer support tickets addressing owner financial petitions to long-term projects like constructions. Currently, over 80% of tasks are generated by our AI based on customer support conversations, and more than 70% of task actions are done with the help of our LLM pipelines. This AI-driven approach is what enables us to scale our operations while providing high-quality service to our clients.
